D

DeferredInvoker - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
Abstract interface specifying how promises constructed by a PromiseFactory defer processing of pending Promise.then(org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.ResolveCallback<? super V, R>, org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.RejectCallback<R>) callbacks.
deferResolve(Thenable<? extends V>) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
Returns a Promise wrapping the given Thenable.
deferResolve(Thenable<? extends V>) - Method in interface org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.Resolver
Defers resolution of the promise to the completion of the given Thenable.
deferResolve(Thenable<? extends V>) - Static method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.gwt.JsPromise
Creates a native promise that defers its resolution to the given thenable.
done(VoidResolveCallback<? super V>, VoidRejectCallback) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.Promise
Convenience method.

F

flatten(Thenable<? extends Thenable<? extends V>>) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
Performs the equivalent of the monadic "join" operation on a thenable that resolves to a thenable, converting it into a promise that resolves to the value of the inner thenable.

G

GwtCompatible - Annotation Type in org.lucidfox.jpromises.annotation
An annotation marking parts of the library (classes and methods) supported under GWT.
GwtIncompatible - Annotation Type in org.lucidfox.jpromises.annotation
An annotation marking parts of the library (classes and methods) not supported under GWT.
GwtPromiseFactory - Class in org.lucidfox.jpromises.gwt
A PromiseFactory specialized for GWT.
GwtPromiseFactory() - Constructor for class org.lucidfox.jpromises.gwt.GwtPromiseFactory
Instantiates a new GWT promise factory.

H

handle(Resolver<V>, Rejector) - Method in interface org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseHandler
Evaluates the promise's value, either successfully (resolving the promise with its new value) or failing (rejecting the promise with an exception).

I

invokeDeferred(Runnable) - Method in interface org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.DeferredInvoker
Schedules the specified Runnable for running "later", in a way that guarantees that it will execute only after the stack unwinds to platform code - "platform code" generally meaning the low-level code running the application's main event loop.

PromiseHandler<V> - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
A handler that loads the initial value into the Promise using the Resolver, or fails using the Rejector (but not both).

R

race(Thenable<? extends V>...) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory

Returns a Promise that wraps multiple thenables or promises.
reject(Throwable) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
Instantiates a Promise that starts rejected with the given exception as its rejection reason.
reject(Throwable) - Method in interface org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.Rejector
Rejects the promise with the given rejection reason.
reject(Throwable) - Static method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.gwt.JsPromise
Creates a native promise rejected with the given exception.
RejectCallback<R> - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
A callback to be invoked when a Promise or arbitrary Thenable is rejected.
Rejector - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
A helper interface used when initializing a promise with a PromiseHandler, to allow the promise handler to reject the promise with an exception, indicating that an error occurred while evaluating the promise's value.
resolve(V) - Method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.PromiseFactory
Instantiates a Promise resolved to the specified value.
resolve(V) - Method in interface org.lucidfox.jpromises.core.Resolver
Resolves the promise to the given value.
resolve(V) - Static method in class org.lucidfox.jpromises.gwt.JsPromise
Creates a native promise resolved to the given value.
ResolveCallback<V,R> - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
A callback to be invoked when a Promise or arbitrary Thenable is resolved.
Resolver<V> - Interface in org.lucidfox.jpromises.core
A helper interface used when initializing a promise with a PromiseHandler, to allow the promise handler to resolve the promise to a specific value.
